article.title: Lockheed Wins Space Fence Contract
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Training, Moorestown, New Jersey, has been awarded a $914,699,474 fixed-price-incentive-firm, cost-reimbursable and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for engineering, manufacturing and development, production and deployment for the Space Fence program. The contractor will have 52 months after contract award to reach initial operational capability. The contract was competitively procured with two bids received. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity (FA8709-14-C-0001).
